attributes.action: Step down and let Shark1e take over running the country, and allow free road tax to all 4x4 owners except hairdressers, School runners and non off roading owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Does exactly what it says in the tin!
Proper 4x4 off-road drivers should be road tax exempt and we should lift the tax on non off roaders who prefer them as fashion icons only!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
